column6:
"CHAIN LIGHTNING" STAND-ALONE ISSUE!,2004,11
A seemingly trivial, low-key mission spirals into a cataclysmic, universe-shattering disaster...all because of a Danish?! The Exiles' most hilarious adventure yet!
